description: Growth can take many forms, but it is a process that is ever in flux. Though some might hold that true growth can only happen by means of magic, maybe the magic is just the example to follow.
- Imbue your Battlestaff with the innate magic present in gold
Remember: If you are unsure of how to craft something, you can always use the search bar provided by EMI at the bottom of your inventory screen to find the recipe.
